Meet the latest addition to our #Superphone lineup - the Le 1s. It packs a Mediatek Helios X10 Octa-core processor, 3GB RAM, 32GB storage, 13MP fast autofocus camera and reversible USB Type-C into an all-metal body. The symmetrical industrial design is an engineering feat in and of itself, and also boasts our bezel-less floating-glass display and sunlight-friendly In Cell screen technology.
